definition.name: Azure App Configuration Sync (Deprecated)
definition.description: DEPRECATED: Use Azure CLI action instead. Follow [these instructions](https://aka.ms/appconfig/githubactions) to set up.
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: configurationFile
inputs.description: Path to the configuration file in the repo, relative to the repo root. Also supports glob patterns and multiple files

inputs.name: format
inputs.description: Format of the configuration file. Valid values are: json, yaml, properties

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.description: Connection string for the App Configuration instance

inputs.name: separator
inputs.description: Separator used when flattening the configuration file to key-value pairs

inputs.name: strict
inputs.description: Specifies whether to use a strict sync which will make the App Configuration instance exactly match the configuration file (deleting key-values not in the configuration file). Defaults to false

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.description: Prefix that will be added to the front of the keys

inputs.name: label
inputs.description: Label to use when setting the key-value pairs. If not specified, a null label will be used

inputs.name: depth
inputs.description: Max depth (positive number) for flattening the configuration file

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Stringified form of a JSON object with the following shape: { [propertyName: string]: string; }

inputs.name: contentType
inputs.description: Content type associated with the values
